works.description: Montblanc, a writing marvel, has always surprised us with amazing and luxurious writing instruments. Be it the Prince Rainier III Limited Edition 81 Pen, Boheme Royal Diamond or the Meisterstück that was created to pay tribute to the brand, each pen is a wonder in itself. Once again the brand is proud to announce its wedding collection pen that has been created to pay homage to H.S.H. Prince Albert II and Princess Charlene of Monaco as a unique wedding gift.
